philosophy.title: The Philosophy of Form
paragraphs: In the beginning, there was only the Linen‚Äîa vast, untouched cream void. Then came the Needle, guided by the artisan's intent, bringing the first spark of color to the fiber.

Rupa is not merely an editor; it is a sanctuary where digital threads are woven into motifs. We believe that every pixel is a Stitch, a deliberate act of creation that requires focus, rhythm, and a peaceful heart.
"We do not paint pixels; we weave light into the fabric of time."

pillars.title: The Needle
pillars.description: Your focal point. Controlled by the Arrow Keys, it moves with the precision of a master weaver.

pillars.title: The Dyes
pillars.description: Pigments of life. Apply them with Space. Use the Number Keys to switch between resonant tones.

pillars.title: The Veils
pillars.description: Layers of depth. Manage them via the Folio Sidebar. Each veil adds a new dimension to your motif.

techniques.title: Threading
techniques.description: Hold Ctrl to pull a continuous line of dye. Flow with the rhythm of the grid.

techniques.title: Spirit Pick
techniques.description: Press W to resonate with connected colors. A magical way to select complex motifs.

techniques.title: The Spindle
techniques.description: The axis of time. Create frames to see your work in motion. Press P to feel the pulse.

techniques.title: Resonance
techniques.description: Listen. The studio breathes with you. Music will emerge once your focus reaches its peak.
